column5: Nice mild fall day with no wind.  Was a great day to be out on the water.  Didn't get great numbers but sometimes that doesn't matter.
Beautiful fish and you're right...it's all about the experience, the fish are a bonus. (At least that's what I keep telling myself lol) Thanks for posting, great pic.
Thats not a perch. LOL  Nice fish. The water looks prime color.
The wind in London is strong enough to make any activity a PITA.
You should of seen Sunday up here. River flows north, float stayed still, and have the upper part of the rod went south. LOL
Been there before, now I'm too old to bother fishing in those conditions.
Im too young to miss those days,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,still.
